attributes.description:
This vehicle is a 2008 Mercedes Benz S500 Auto with pure comfort in it, class and style all come together beautifully, Is it the best vehicle in the world? Some will argue yes, with the tons of features and extras this S –class is loaded with it might just be the best in the world. The vehicle come with power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, soft-close doors, leather seats, air conditioning, front climate control, central locking remote, radio/CD player, reverse camera, ashtray package, navigation system, electric seats, electric sunroof glass version, wood finish, calyptus, night view system, remote boot-lid closing, power closing, keyless-go, automatic climate control in the rear and a touch of wood grain. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
#10252

attributes.title: 2017 Toyota Corolla Quest 1.6

attributes.description:
Toyota GR 3.0 Supra

Building on its history and designed for the future, the fifth generation GR Supra is the thoroughbred sports car that performance enthusiasts have been waiting for.

The new GR Supra owns the road with intelligent and dynamic design. Viewed in profile, the lowest point of the bonnet flows near-horizontally to the rear of the car for an ultra-athletic stance. The low placement of the rear spoiler further facilitates the creation of a low, continuously flowing belt line. Finally, the combination of the rearward-slanting cabin silhouette and forward slanting-underbody epitomises classic sports car styling.

The new GR Supra has been designed to deliver driving pleasure and superlative performance at accessible limits. The generous power of the GR Supra comes from the straight-six cylinder 3.0â„“ engine which is equipped with direct fuel injection, turbocharging and mated to an 8-speed automatic gearbox delivering 250 kW of power. The Supra boasts a wide rev range as well as the fitment of launch and traction control and electronically controlled Limited Slip Differential (LSD) which optimises the rear-wheel driving experience. The Sport button, sharpens the steering and throttle response as well as Adaptive Variable Suspension (AVS)*comprised of MacPherson struts in front and a multi-link rear.
